attributes.action: That Kenny Dalglish be knighted for his support Of Hillsborough families.
attributes.background:
Kenny Dalglish witnessed first hand the Hillsborough Disaster unfold before his eyes. During the days that followed, he was a rock to the families of those who died. 
After this time, he has been a constant support to the families of those who died.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
